thought: The website is accessible. Next, I should check the content of the website to look for any scam characteristics.
observation: Home | Flynn Zito Capital Management, LLC  Skip to main content menu Home Our Firm About Us How We Work Who Holds My Assets? FZCM Merchandise Store FZCM Green Policy St. Jude Form CRS Your Team Doug Flynn, CFP®, ChFC® Rich Zito, CFP®, CMFC® Ryan Haiss, CFP® Steve Aberman, ChFC® Anne Lambert Stefan Gollisz Gary Simel Tina Malliet, FPQP® Derrick Stubblefield Mitchell Bermudez Robert “Trip” McLane Peyton Flynn Cole Flynn, APMA® Maria Patino, FPQP Sabrina Singh Our Services Comprehensive Portfolio Management Asset Management Retirement Plan Consulting Advice Only Financial Planning and Consulting Blog In the Media Publications Client Login AccountView 2.0 AccountView Legacy Wealth Management Contact Us Previous Slide Next Slide CREATING A PLAN FOR FINANCIAL FREEDOM PURSUING SUCCESS BY WORKING TOGETHER We strive to serve our clients during the financial planning process through deep and meaningful relationships that last for generations LEARN MORE TODAY ABOUT HOW WE HELP Contact us today to find out how we can help with your financial needs PROVEN INVESTMENT EXPERIENCE With decades of portfolio management experience, we have the insight for your future WORLD CLASS WEALTH MANAGEMENT Planning for growth and the unexpected for a work optional lifestyle FLYNN ZITO CAPITAL MANAGEMENT, LLC Many people know Flynn Zito Capital Management as one of the most well-respected investment management partnerships.  They might also know Doug Flynn from his regular TV appearances on various financial programs.  And anyone who has ever worked with Rich Zito, Ryan Haiss or Steve Aberman know them as determined, committed professionals who constantly go above and beyond to make a positive impact on the lives of others. One thing's for sure: people who know the Flynn Zito team know they are one of the hardest-working team of professionals around - and that's enough for them.  They've earned a reputation that reflects the high standards they have for themselves, their families and the people they serve.  They are compassionate, caring wealth preservation specialists who help clients pursue their individual investment objectives by offering objective financial advice. If you need guidance on investments and financial planning set your sights high. Experience a higher standard of excellence in wealth management. Learn more The prospect of building wealth through successful investing has never held more appeal. Independent financial guidance and investment advice. Year-In-Review Highlights of Doug Flynn, CFP on NewsNation Join us for a recap of some highlights from Certified Financial Planner Doug Flynn's enlightening financial discussions on NewsNation Now throughout the year. Flynn shares valuable insights on investment strategies, cash management, interest rates, market trends, and real estate considerations in this compilation. From bear-chase analogies to analysis on mortgage rates and market reactions, Flynn's expertise shines through, offering practical advice and keen observations for navigating the financial landscape. Watch now for a concise roundup of Flynn's invaluable financial perspectives this past year! Click here to see more TV Appearances The opinions voiced in this material are for general information only and are not intended to provide specific advice or recommendations for any individual. OUR SERVICES There are many financial products in the market, and so choosing the ones that best meet an individual client’s needs can be complicated. Our comprehensive portfolio management service encompasses asset management as well as providing financial planning/financial consulting to clients. We emphasize continuous and regular account supervision.  As part of our asset management service, we generally create a portfolio, consisting of individual stocks or bonds, ETFs, options, mutual funds and other public investments. We provide retirement plan consulting services to employer plan sponsors on a one-time or ongoing basis. We provide a variety of financial planning and consulting services to individuals, families and other clients regarding the management of their financial resources based upon an analysis of client’s current situation, goals, and objectives. Learn more about our amazing team of professionals. Brooke Ober brooke.ober@lplfinancial.com Doug Flynn CFP®, ChFC® CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ Professional (CFP®) 516-746-9000 flynn.zito@lpl.com Rich Zito Ryan Haiss CFP® ryan.haiss@lpl.com Steve Aberman ChFC® Chartered Financial Consultant (ChFC®) steve.aberman@lpl.com Wealth Advisor anne.lambert@lpl.com Financial Advisor, Trade Desk Operations Associate Financial Advisor Tina Malliet FPQP® Financial Paraplanner Qualified Professional℠ (FPQP®) Director of Administration Trade Desk Operations Manager Operations Associate Cole Flynn APMA® Accredited Portfolio Management Advisor℠ (APMA®) Maria Patino Office 585 Stewart Avenue Suite 620 Contact Info Phone Fax Email Don't hesitate to get in touch with us. Contact us form Your name This field is required. Your email address Subject Message CAPTCHA Leave this field blank Legal, privacy, copyright and trademark information Investment advice offered through Flynn Zito Capital Management, LLC, a Registered Investment Advisor. Securities offered through LPL Financial, member FINRA SIPC, The LPL Financial Registered Representatives associated with the website may only discuss and/or transact securities business with residents of the following states: CA, CO, CT, FL, GA, IN, MD, MI, NC, NH, NJ, NY, PA, SC, TX, VA. The Flynn Zito Capital Management, LLC Investment Advisor Representatives associated with this website may discuss advisory services with residents of the following states: AZ, CA, CO, CT, DC, DE, FL, GA, HI, IL, MA, MD, ME, MI, MS, NC, NH, NJ, NY, OH, OR, PA, RI, SC, TN, TX, VT, VA, WA, WV. Additional states available upon request. © 2024 Flynn Zito Capital Management, LLC All rights reserved.

However, there are some points that need verification, like the legitimacy of the company and the update frequency of the information listed. I should also check the domain information and search for reviews or complaints online.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is registered, has a long history (since 1999), and doesn't expire until 2031. The use of a privacy service to register the domain is common among legitimate businesses. The domain status of clientTransferProhibited indicates that the domain cannot be transferred without the domain owner's consent, which is a security measure often employed by legitimate domain owners. The company's details are consistent with a professional business, and there are no immediate red flags. However, I should check the reputation of the business online to ensure there are no complaints or scam reports related to it.

thought: The search results provide external sources that reference Flynn Zito Capital Management, including their own website, an advisory firm network, and a Glassdoor company profile. These sources suggest that the firm is legitimate, with a physical office location, a team of financial advisors, and a substantial amount of assets under management. Additionally, there's a mention of a certified financial planner from the firm being quoted in a MarketWatch article, which lends further credibility to the firm's existence and operations. Based on the observations made from the website's content, domain information, and online reputation, there are no signs indicating that the URL belongs to a scam website. Therefore, I can conclude that the website is legitimate and not a scam. The website https://www.flynnzito.com/ is not a scam website.

observation.reason: The domain has a long history and is registered until 2031. WHOIS information indicates a legitimate business with security measures in place. Additionally online search results corroborate the existence of a physical office a team of financial advisors and a presence in the industry with assets under management. There are no scam characteristics based on the website's content or external information.
